title: Template
content: Hi As a medical professional I often need to send referral or feedback emails to others in the medical field. How do I set up Thunderbird such that my letterhead can be made as a template, that the text can be typed directly and sent from the mail program? Currently, I type it up in MS Word, print it out on to my practice letterhead, scan it, then attach it to a new email - it's a pain. Thank you
creator: Jeffrey6015

title: Thunderbird installation fails and calendars unavailable
content: I have tried installing Thunderbird four time on my Windows 10 PC. Each time it gets to 33% and stalls. Most recently, I have reduced, compacted and repaired my outlook PSTs but the outcome is unchanged. AN additional problem is that the installation process does not offer to import calendars.

(picture 2) Ok, I decided to cancel my event... and my colleagues received the cancelation...without previous invitation. Please, help! My t-b version: 115.0.1 (64 bits) Regards, Monika
creator: monika.balaama

title: SMTP kiszolgáló
content: Üdv! Nem tudok levelet küldeni egyik postafiókomból sem. Annyi történt, hogy 10 napra elutaztam és lekapcsoltam a számítógépet. Most csak fogadni tudok, küldeni nem. Ezt a hibaüzenetet kapom: Az üzenet küldése sikertelen. Az üzenet küldése sikertelen, mert nem lehetett kapcsolatot teremteni a levélküldő (SMTP) kiszolgálóval (mail.t-online.hu). A kiszolgáló elérhetetlen, vagy visszautasítja az SMTP kapcsolatokat. Ellenőrizze, hogy a levélküldő (SMTP) kiszolgáló beállításai helyesek-e, és próbálja meg újra. Több különböző fiókom van, de mindegyikhez ugyanezt az üzenetet kapom. Köszönettel: Attila
creator: senju1049

title: I can't log in to my Google Family Link child account with Thunderbird
content:
Perhaps because the login page is an old type, unlike when logging in to websites and apps with Google, there is no screen asking for parental approval. On the other hand, it was possible to log in even if two-factor authentication was attached to non-managed accounts (parental accounts, etc.). Can't the login page be a new type (current) like Windows Mail?

By the way, I cannot turn off the management setting by Family Link.

Thunderbird version is 115.
creator: y.kamoshita

title: Resgatar configurações das pastas do Thunderbird
content: Boa noite, Fazia uso do Thunderbird em um laptop Dell com Manjaro. Durante problemas de atualização do sistema, fiz errroneamente atualização parcial do sistema. Em resumo, terei que fazer reinstalação do Manjaro. Estou resgatando todo o conteúdo do SSD. A minha outra preocupação está nas confirmações das pastas / abas do meu Thunderbird. Faço uso do Gmail. Por questões profissionais tive que criar várias pastas e subpastas e preciso levar essa configuração para o Thunderbird no lapto reinataldo. Tem como? Ou essa configuração será automática pois as pastas ficam também configuradas no Gmail? Obrigado.
creator: johnb.acad

title: Installed 105.x.x over 102.x.x and all inbox(es) are missing
content: I was using version 102.x.x without any issue, but them I downloaded version 105.x.x and installed it over the previous one without uninstalling it. Now, I cannot see my inbox(es), though I can see contacts. Please help how do I restore the inboxes.
creator: linguait

title: Getting inbox copied to Local Folders - Unable to set path error
content:
Hi,

In Thunderbird (fresh install of 115.01) on Win 10,

I'm trying to set my (pop) Server Settings Local Directory to:

C:\Thunderbird\Profiles\rxd7d4d1.default\Mail\Local Folders

that is where years of my prior emails are stored. I can see them in the Local Folders.

I'm just trying to make my Verizon mail save locally into that location also.

However, I get the error:

The Local Directory path "C:\Thunderbird\Profiles\rxd7d4d1.default\Mail\Local Folders" is not suitable for message storage. Please choose another directory.

Why exactly is Thunderbird choking on that path? What can I do about it?

This is the path where all my history is stored. I moved there from the Appdata/Roaming area, which has the same problem!

Many thanks to anyone who can provide a precise answer!
creator: steve.johns
